novice_features.name: Interactive Dashboards
novice_features.description: User-friendly visualizations of key statistics and trends, designed to help novices understand data quickly.

novice_features.name: Educational Tutorials
novice_features.description: Step-by-step guides on foundational betting concepts, strategies, and terminology available in text and video format.

novice_features.name: Glossary of Betting Terms
novice_features.description: A comprehensive glossary explaining common betting terms and jargon to make them accessible for beginners.

novice_features.name: Curated Expert Commentary
novice_features.description: Summaries of expert analyses and opinions that break down complex concepts into digestible insights for novices.

novice_features.name: Decision-Making Checklists
novice_features.description: Structured lists to help novices evaluate key factors when deciding on bets, ensuring they consider all relevant details.

novice_features.name: Live Chat Support
novice_features.description: A live Q&A feature that allows novices to ask questions and receive immediate assistance with betting queries.

novice_features.name: Practice Mode
novice_features.description: A simulated betting environment that allows novices to place mock bets with virtual currency to practice before betting real money.

novice_features.name: Webinars with Experts
novice_features.description: Regular live sessions with betting experts where novices can ask questions and learn about current trends and strategies.
